name: Christian Ricketts
bio: Can you say 'awesome sauce'? Christian Ricketts is an accomplished professional standup comedian who has been performing tons of amazing material since 2008. Asides from having written more than several hours of amazing material, they also perform as such memorable characters as Terry MacKulkan, Racist Old Man, and Carl Sagan. Lots of people have seen him and like it. He has appeared in several Bridgetown Comedy Festivals, Seattle Sketchfest, won the SF Comedy and Burrito Festival, was the #1 winner twice in Competitive Erotic Fan Fiction, he's contributing writer for Exotic Magazine, and Ricketts even got an award at the Oregon International Film Festival for straight up acting. He most often perform at venues in the Pacific Northwest, California, and the illegally annexed Kingdom of Hawaii.
